title: Corki billy cart
body:
Awesome work!

http://s12.postimg.org/heo2i03hp/2015_11_15_11_06_52.jpg

http://s12.postimg.org/y3pidx031/2015_11_15_11_06_54.jpg

They needed some speed buffs though.

{{item:1326}}

replies.body:
Nah it's not me. I was just there to watch (was a red bull billy cart race in Sydney). 

That was just after the finish line. The guy pictured is the driver. Don't know who it was.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=irQWReti,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-11-15T05:14:08.518+0000)
>
> Nah it's not me. I was just there to watch (was a red bull billy cart race in Sydney). 
> 
> That was just after the finish line. The guy pictured is the driver. Don't know who it was.

Well he has my vote on best billy cart at the event already.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

If only you were there to see it - it was in serious danger of stopping on the hill! 

[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fvOY0SlVF5w)

It was so awesome - as soon as it came out I'm like "Holey schmidt! thats corki!" and their walkout music was the urf login screen theme blasting through centennial park

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I8jP6TBQX-I

Was so cool. As soon as I saw that I knew it was gonna be a good day.
wait when did we stop being able to attach pictures?
